(Also forgot to mention Vehement and his goons arrived and Vehement opened 
fine on you, but that's ok.  Just thought I'd change the subject since it 
ain't OOC anymore)


Serpentor/Vehement:



Serpentor raised his plasma launcher to point at Lunaprine's head as he 
transformed into his half-wolf mode.  Serpentor dropped his plasma launcher 
and fell to his knees, his right hand covering where his right audio receptor 
would be, his left hand trying to do the same.  Serpentor started yelling out 
in pain, clenching his optics for a second to try and think clearly.  He 
opened them back up, firing an optic blast off at the wolfbot in front of him.

---

Vehement silently walked along the burnt grass of South Africa, looking and 
smiling at the carnage.  He raised his left arm, the hand at the end of the 
arm changing into a long silver barrel.  He raised the barrel to point at 
Lunaprine's back.

A missile launched off from the barrel out at Lunaprine's back, the missile 
an energy-signature seeking missile.  Vehement smiled, looking for a new 
target.  He didn't really want to choose just one.  But, since he was allied 
with the Alliance, it wouldn't be nice to let one of their ranks die at the 
hands of infidels.  Of course, they were all heathens and would die 
eventually, but the Divine One wasn't back in this realm.  Vehement's optics 
sensors glowed a bright crimson as he watched a missile launch out from the 
CF and strike him in the chest.

He didn't make a sound, his body shaking for a moment.  He stood his ground 
though.  He looked down to his chest as if barely intersted.  An expression 
of rage reached his face as he saw his ceremonial robes were burnt and 
ruined.  He raised his right arm, which changed into the shape of a long 
silver barrel, two missiles launching out at the Cybertronian Fire as if in 
retaliation.
